InformativeText.Abstract: The Time Exponential 8 characteristic is used to represent a measure of period of time in seconds.

Field.name: Time Exponential 8
Field.InformativeText: The time duration is given by the value 1.1^(N-64) in seconds, with N being the raw 8-bit value.
Field.Description: A raw value of 0x00 represents 0 seconds, and a raw value of 0xFF represents the total life of the device.
